lines.text: Who were you expecting? The Phantom of the Opera?
These are all elements of witchcraft. There is a common denominator in all the mystery cults.
They've got a lot of legends about this island. Witches and rainbows and shit.

[possessed by the Lady in Black]
There are three doors to the darkside. Lust, avarice, and ire. Linda for the lust, Rose for the greed, and ire for the persecuted witch.
See, even your poet knows virginity is not natural for a grown woman.
